description:
Inosuke charges into Makio’s room, which he finds empty, but detects the presence of a demon. Giving chase, he ends up losing the demon by a hair.
Meanwhile, at Kyogoku House, Zenitsu tracks down the source of the young girl’s sobs, where he encounters an oiran, who he is sure is a demon. The demon who dwells in the Entertainment District as Warabihime Oiran is Upper Six, Daki.
Source: official webpage
